content:
Here are some of the data points or properties that may be required for the tracking and monitoring business scenario:

1. Shipment tracking number or ID
2. Carrier or shipping provider name
3. Shipment status (e.g. in transit, delivered, delayed)
4. Shipment location (e.g. current location, previous location)
5. Estimated delivery date/time and actual delivery date/time
6. Carrier contact information
7. Shipping method (e.g. ground, air, expedited)
8. Package weight and dimensions
9. Delivery address
10. Shipping cost
11. Reason for any delays or delivery exceptions
12. Signature proof of delivery
13. Exception notifications
14. Shipping history or tracking log
15. Escalation process for addressing any issues or complaints related to shipment tracking.

Please note that the actual data points or properties required for the tracking and monitoring business scenario may vary depending on the specific needs of your business and the types of shipments being tracked.
